articles.title: Herd immunity for adults by the end of May? Austin-Travis County health officials hope to make it happen - KXAN.com
articles.description: Dr. Mark Escott, the Austin Public Health interim health authority, said while herd immunity could happen by then in adults, COVID-19 can still circulate in children so, in his estimation, early fall would be the earliest time the community could “relax.”
articles.content:
